abstract: The drug maker exceeded analysts’ third-quarter estimates by 2 cents.
snippet: The drug maker exceeded analysts’ third-quarter estimates by 2 cents.
lead_paragraph: The drug maker Merck reported third-quarter profit on Friday that rose more than analysts had estimated, as reduced costs helped overcome revenue losses from drugs facing generic competition.

headline.main: Cost Cuts Help Merck to Avert Revenue Losses
headline.print_headline: BUSINESS BRIEFING | MEDICINE; Merck’s Profit Was Better Than Expected
